title: Meta Plummets as Investors Ignore Plea for ‘Patience’
itunes:title: Meta Plummets as Investors Ignore Plea for ‘Patience’
description:
Bloomberg News Big Tech Team Leader Sarah Frier reports on Meta shares plummeting on Thursday as Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg’s plea for ‘patience’ from investors falls flat. Dr. Tamar Mendelson, Director for the Center for Adolescent Health at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about seeing an increase in mental health problems for children and adolescents. Andy Marsh, CEO of Plug Power, discusses the company’s green hydrogen ecosystem strategy and build out. And we Drive to the Close with Brian Frank, Portfolio Manager at Frank Capital Partners.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
